title: 573.13 CONTRIBUTION AMONG HEIRS.
text: When any heir, devisee, or legatee pays more than a proportional share of such debt, the other persons liable shall be holden and compelled to contribute their just proportion of the same.

variables.name: paid_share
variables.description: The amount paid by the heir, devisee, or legatee.

variables.name: proportional_share
variables.description: The proportional share of the debt that the heir, devisee, or legatee is responsible for.

variables.name: other_liable_persons_contribution
variables.description: The contribution made by other persons liable for the debt.

variables.name: compelled_to_contribute
variables.description: Indicates whether other liable persons are compelled to contribute their just proportion.

consequences: Other liable persons are compelled to contribute their just proportion of the debt.
